View Javadoc

1   package org.lindbergframework.persistence.transaction;
2   
3   import javax.sql.DataSource;
4   
5   import org.lindbergframework.beans.di.annotation.Bean;
6   import org.lindbergframework.exception.TransactionException;
7   import org.lindbergframework.exception.TransactionFailureException;
8   import org.lindbergframework.persistence.context.LinpContext;
9   import org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceTransactionManager;
10  import org.springframework.transaction.PlatformTransactionManager;
11  import org.springframework.transaction.TransactionStatus;
12  import org.springframework.transaction.support.TransactionCallback;
13  import org.springframework.transaction.support.TransactionTemplate;
14  
15  /**
16   * Transaction template implementation that uses Spring transaction resources to manage transactions of database.
17   * 
18   * @author Victor Lindberg
19   *
20   */
21  @Bean("defaultLinpTransactionManager")
22  public class LinpSpringTransactionManager extends TransactionTemplate
23                                implements TransactionManager{
24      
25      private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
26  
27      public LinpSpringTransactionManager(){
28          this(LinpContext.getInstance().getDataSource());
29      }
30      
31      /**
32       * constructor that uses DataSourceTransactionManager as PlatformTransactionManager implementation.
33       */
34      public LinpSpringTransactionManager(DataSource dataSource){
35          this(new DataSourceTransactionManager(dataSource));
36      }
37  
38      /**
39       * Creates a LinpSpringTransactionManager with the specified PlatformTransactionManager imlementation.
40       * 
41       * @param transactionManager PlatformTransactionManager imlementation.
42       */
43      public LinpSpringTransactionManager(PlatformTransactionManager transactionManager){
44          super(transactionManager);
45      }
46      
47      /**
48       * {@inheritDoc}
49       */
50      public Object execute(TransactionalContext transactionalContext)
51          throws TransactionException {
52          final TransactionalContext finalContext = transactionalContext;
53          return super.execute(new TransactionCallback(){
54             public Object doInTransaction(TransactionStatus status) {
55                 try{
56                  return finalContext.call();
57                 }catch(Throwable ex){
58                     throw new TransactionFailureException(
59                         "Transaction failure", ex);    
60                 }
61              } 
62          });
63      }
64  
65  }
